entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
